alert.note: Alert for Montezuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 11 at 9:05AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY FOR THE TOWN OF DOLORES... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...The town of Dolores. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Snowmelt causing minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas, including over roadways. Ponding of water in the town of Dolores is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 855 AM MDT, emergency management reported flooding in Downtown Dolores. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dolores. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
